Wak Rathar was a wizard living in Hillsfar in 1367 DR. As an old friend of Lord Maalthiir, he was permitted to do all he wished.
Wak had a sick sense of humor. He enjoyed sending people into the Arena for only the sport of it. One of this tricks was offering adventurers a demonstration of magic, then disappearing and leaving a pile of gold behind, gold he later claimed was stolen. Alternatively, Wak would ask "want to see a magic trick?" and disappear with the unwitting victims magic items.
In the , Wak Rathar targeted adventurer Mhai the Mage, offering to show him a magic trick. Mahai fell for such ploy once before and promptly turned the old mage down. As of the , Wak Rathars eccentric and cruel antics made him even less popular than Lord Maalthiir. Due to this foul reputation, Mordak Brelliar was virulently advising the citys ruler to distance himself from the old wizard. Mordaks advice came from fear of Rathars future grab for power.
